Package org.apache.heron.api.spout

Interface IRichSpout

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent, ISpout, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ABSpout, BaseRichSpout, ComplexSource, CustomSpout, HdfsStringSpout, HeronExecutorTaskTest.TestSpout, HeronSubmitterTest.TestSpout, HeronSubmitterTest.TestSpout2, IntegrationTestSpout, IRichSpoutDelegate, IRichSpoutDelegate, KafkaSpout, LocalFileSpout, PausedLocalFileSpout, StatefulABSpout, StatefulIntegrationTestSpout, StatefulIntegrationTopologyTestSpout, StatefulNumberSpout, StatefulRandomIntSpout, StatefulSpout, StatefulWindowingTest.RandomSentenceSpout, StreamletSource, SupplierSource, TestSpout, TestStatefulSpout, TestTwoPhaseStatefulSpout, UnserializableCustomSpout, WindowTestBase.IncrementingSpout, WordSpout
    public interface IRichSpout
extends ISpout, IComponent
    When writing topologies using Java, IRichBolt and IRichSpout are the main interfaces to use to implement components of the topology.
